funding disbursed was US$ 30.9 million in pooled funds and US$ 9.1 million in non-pooled 
World Bank funds. Proposed use for the additional non-pooled funds is implementation of 
a comprehensive food fortification programme to decrease micronutrient deficiencies in

In the past, programmes in Tanzania that were multi-component, community-based, and 
adequate in intensity resulted in reductions in malnutrition among children less than 5 years
